ai-tha-ap226:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap226:1.3_0: I’ve given a safe place to a sage,
ai-tha-ap226:1.4_0: the Holy One, the peaceful one,
ai-tha-ap226:2.1_0: Through that deed and through its result,
ai-tha-ap226:2.3_0: When a person has been reborn in a lower realm,
ai-tha-ap226:2.4_0: for me to be found in me.
ai-tha-ap226:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap226:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap226:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap226:7.1_0: for the fourth (of the for) the Elder Rakkhasas, (haved) the fourth full moon.
